about_the_game:
The Aplestia:Retold Walkthrough Guide is a 65 A3 page pdf file. It presents the game in screenshots, accompanied with text and various tables for loot. Everything done with a friendly way and a first-playthrough manner. In essence, it is a "play along" companion book.

The guide contains all dungeon and stages layouts, their loot and the enemies within them. Furthermore, it presents in text and symbols, the optimal order for the player to visit places, so that you leave no item or quest behind! Enemy stats, skills and spells, loot and items, apparel and points of interest are shown clearly in their own tables and emphatically. At the very end, you will also find the quest log table, where all side quest names are written, how to initiate them, how to complete them and what reward they give.

The walkthrough guide presents only the Normal Difficulty enemy information.

Where to find the guide? Go to C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Aplestia Retold folder.

Or directly through Steam. Right-click on Aplestia:Retold in your library and select Properties > Local Files > Browse Local Files.
